--- In gladiator@y..., "Rory Wilde" <laughingmadman@h...> wrote:
> i think the single charecter is. because it'll get super strong.

I'd argue a team is much better.  Even super strong character can't 
take on an entire army without getting severely hurt.

I'd also issue caution about a character getting TOO STRONG.  If you 
ever get past experience level 200, be carefull.  I don't think any 
experience level 300 character does not have a problem with exceeding 
some limit of the game.

With the scenario converter, I might be able to prove that point.
